title: Revert to Version 67

requirements.text: Restore the complete project state from Version 67, including all backend files, frontend files, and configuration
acceptanceCriteria: All files match the exact state they were in at Version 67
Backend main.mo is restored to Version 67 implementation
Frontend components are restored to Version 67 implementation
AuthProvider-related changes from Versions 68-71 are removed
Application builds and deploys successfully with Version 67 code

requirements.text: Remove any AuthProvider context wrapper or authentication context changes that were introduced after Version 67
acceptanceCriteria: No AuthProvider wrapping errors occur in production build
Authentication flow works as it did in Version 67

constraints: Must restore exact Version 67 state without modifications
Do not introduce any new features or changes beyond the revert
nonGoals: Fixing or improving any issues that existed in Version 67
